DOC.brief_summary: The goal study test new vitamin D compound ability reduce parathyroid hormone level patient hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study Oral Vitamin D Compound ( DP001 ) Secondary Hyperparathyroidism Patients Hemodialysis
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study vitamin D analog 2-methylene-19-nor-20S-1α,25-dihydroxyvitamin D3 ( DP001 ) patient end-stage renal disease ( ESRD ) . The effect 12 week oral administration DP001 serum parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) level evaluate ESRD patient secondary hyperparathyroidism .
DOC.criteria: Men nonpregnant woman ≥18 year age Patient diagnose ESRD must hemodialysis 3 time per week least 3 month prior Screening Phase Patient currently treat pharmaceutical vitamin D treatment secondary hyperparathyroidism Serum iPTH value ≤500 pg/mL first screen visit Total serum calcium ( correct albumin ) ≤10.5 mg/dL first screen visit Serum phosphorus ≤7.0 mg/dL first screen visit Currently take follow : drug affect vitamin D metabolism , digitalis , glucocorticoid , cyclosporine immunosuppressant , aluminumbased phosphate binder A daily intake > 4000 IU vitamin D ( D3 + D2 ) Any investigational drug use within 10 halflives drug ( within previous 30 day halflife drug unknown ) History follow : ventricular dysrhythmias , severe congestive heart failure , angina pectoris , myocardial infarction , coronary angioplasty , coronary artery bypass grafting , multiple myeloma , calciphylaxis , active malignancy , endstage liver disease , active infection , clinically significant renal/urinary tract stone , sarcoidosis , tuberculosis , parathyroidectomy Major surgery within past 3 month
